job_description: Client Principal, Global Transformation Office In order for Dell Technologies to be so successful in leading the way in a changing world of technology, we rely on the collaboration of all of our thought leaders and customers. Our Client Principal team within the Global Transformation Office, is forging the bridge between our thought leaders and customers by organizing, driving transformations, and creating relationships to align our customers with Dell Technologies' vision and solutions. We embody the "trusted advisor" role by managing the overall sales strategies for Account Teams and driving multi-million-dollar client investments in products delivering transformational value. As well as keeping the transformation team updated and engaged, we are recognized as a subject matter expert for Dell Technologies transformational capabilities. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Client Principal on our Global Transformation Office Team in Tokyo, Japan . Since the convergence of telecommunications infrastructure with IT has become trend nowadays, shared infrastructure based on normal IT technology (not telecommunication-specific) is happening by involving Cloud. This is dramatic change in Telecommunication industry and we are looking for the one who can lead this drastic change in the telecommunications industry with their IT skill. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements • 10+ years in IT sales or management consulting, including 5+ years in a Partner/Principal role • Experience directly leading Client Executives, Account Executives and Customer CXOs through multi-year transformations of at least $50M, starting during the pre-sales cycle through delivery. • Prior work on topics outside of IT strategy, including organization design, change management, and process redesign. • Experience in orchestrating technical and sales resources to drive large customer projects in your key accounts. • Experience working in matrixed, complex, fast-moving and constantly changing environments within an extremely competitive market. • Multiyear experience consulting with CXO of large corporations to help them position their organizations for success Desirable Requirements • Experience working in Telecommunications, CSP or similar industry • In depth understanding of 5G, PaaS / CaaS / IaaS, devops, AI, security, data storage, private cloud and hyper-converged solutions, as well as the solution’s value when mapped to an account’s industry and business needs. • Bachelor’s degree, MBA or advanced degree preferred, or a combination of education and experience. 福利厚生 社会保険完 備 （雇用保険、労 災 保険、健康保険、厚生年金保険） 健康支援：任意加入団体医療保険、スポーツ補助金など 所得補償：長期私傷病休暇、長期所得補償保険 育児・介護支援：出産特別休暇、産前産後休暇、育児休業・子の看護休暇、介護休業・介護休暇、残業等規制、短時間勤務等、育児・介護補助金など 資産形成：確定拠出年金、社内キャッシュバランスプラン 、 財形貯蓄 慶弔対応：特別弔慰金、慶弔見舞金、慶弔休暇 生活支援：通勤手当、社員割引制度、在宅勤 務 制度 など ◆ カジュアル面談 ◆ 応募 を 悩まれ てい る方、 ポジションや会社 概要 についてまずは お 話を聞いてみたい 方は カジュアル面談 をご活用ください。 カジュアル面談は 選考ではありません 。 採用担当者とざっくばらん に話 し、 ご 経験やご希望 に合致するポジション 、気になっていること をご確認 いただけます 。 面談 の お申込みは こちら ◆ ダイバーシティの推進 ◆ 私たちは 、 2030年まで に 、 「 性 自認が女性である 人が世界中の社員の50%、​管理職の40% を占める 」 という 目標を 掲げ て 日々取り組んでいます。 さまざまなアイデンティティや バックグラウンドを持つ 人 たち が集まり、 誰も が 力を発揮 して活躍 できるカルチャー を 育んでいます。 女性のキャリア支援について詳しくは Women a t Dell Japan をご覧ください。 デル・テクノロジーズについて デル・テクノロジーズは、個人と組織の働き方・暮らしの変革を支援するユニークな企業です。 社員 一人ひとり の 影響力を信じ 、 すべての取り組み において 社員 を最優先に考えます 。I T 業界で 最先端のテクノロジー を学び、 経験を積む 成長 機会を 求め てい る 方はぜひご応募ください。 進歩に向かって共に前へ進みませんか。 Job ID: R232824 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our locations page.
